info.name: Buy Me a Cola
info.description:
Sure, coffee can be taken black
But cola's nicer

Also, because it fits, if you like this, why not consider buying me a cola?
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Jordy3D
info.additionalInfo:
Update 1 - Changes on their end required changes on mine, so they were changed.
Also, the home page was added to this change, since it was forgotten in the initial release, whoops...

Update 2 - Big changes from them roughly an hour before writing, if I missed something let me know!

Update 3!
- Been a while! Things changed, so I changed em now, should be more of a solid dark experience going forward. I have little reason to check back to the site too much so it falls behind. If you wanna see it keep up to date more, be sure to support to give me a reason to return!
- Made notifications dark
- Updated some icons that weren't dark
- Updated the Kola icon
- Updated dashboard, either an error or an oversight on my part broke something
- Updated the currency dropdown
- Updated the text input page
- Added a dark scrollbar

Update 4
- So, right after I thought I updated the style, either I missed a whole lot or it was changed again. Things should be more complete now
- Updated the Edit Page window
- Updated the Create a Post stuff
- Updated the text on a Post

Update 5
- I think there was just some changes on their end. Logged in and saw it, so changed them back.

Update 6
- Minor UI changes in the admin menus
- I got my first Support, so now I could update the relevant elements (big thanks for that one!!)

Update 7
- Minor update to minor things

Update 8 - Rework!
- So turns out the style was broken quite a lot. Given I don't get much supp- I mean, don't visit the site often, I didn't notice. Version 2 is now up, remade from the ground up. I'll try to monitor it for a bit, but sadly no promises.
